argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | submgmss.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | #P_ssid | |- B C_ B |
| 3 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( M e. Mgm -> B C_ B ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_ressid | |- ( M e. Mgm -> ( M |`s B ) = M ) |
| 5 |  | #P_id | |- ( M e. Mgm -> M e. Mgm ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( M e. Mgm -> ( M |`s B ) e. Mgm ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( M |`s B ) = ( M |`s B ) |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_issubmgm2 | |- ( M e. Mgm -> ( B e. ( SubMgm ` M ) <-> ( B C_ B /\ ( M |`s B ) e. Mgm ) ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 6, 8 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( M e. Mgm -> B e. ( SubMgm ` M ) ) |
